${ModID}:BeyondTheStars.NAME: Beyond the Stars
${ModID}:BeyondTheStars.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain a *Madness.
${ModID}:BeyondTheStars.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain a *Madness+.

${ModID}:NamelessMist.NAME: Nameless Mist
${ModID}:NamelessMist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain another !M! whenever you play a card this turn.

${ModID}:PageOfTheDead.NAME: Page of the Dead
${ModID}:PageOfTheDead.DESCRIPTION: Gain a *Necronomicurse. NL The next Attack you play that costs 2 or more is played twice.
${ModID}:PageOfTheDead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next Attack you play that costs 2 or more is played twice.

${ModID}:FamilialCurse.NAME: Familial Curse
${ModID}:FamilialCurse.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ruin to ALL enemies. NL Next turn, gain a *Madness and lose 1 HP.

${ModID}:AllSeeing.NAME: All Seeing
${ModID}:AllSeeing.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, Scry !M! and take 3 damage.

${ModID}:EndOfDays.NAME: End of Days
${ModID}:EndOfDays.DESCRIPTION: At end of turn, Channel a Dark for each [E] unspent.
${ModID}:EndOfDays.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL At end of turn, Channel a Dark for each [E] unspent.

${ModID}:RlyehFhtagn.NAME: R'lyeh Fhtagn
${ModID}:RlyehFhtagn.DESCRIPTION: Put EVERYONE to sleep. Next turn, gain 3 *Madness and lose 3 HP. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:RlyehFhtagn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put EVERYONE to sleep. Next turn, gain 3 *Madness+ and lose 3 HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StarSpawn.NAME: Star Spawn
${ModID}:StarSpawn.DESCRIPTION: Deal 13 damage twice. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Channel a Plasma. NL Exhaust.
